channel.title: SP GLOBAL DJs PODCAST
channel.description:
By far one of the best electronic music podcasts around. SP DJs include Gerard Mattera DJ Rob Solomon, We strive to bring you the best in Progressive House, Electro, Tech-House, Minimal, Techno, Chillout & Deep House.
Our podcast is a combination of live recorded shows, compilations and productions for listeners around the globe. You can dowload our podcast from Itunes directly into your ipod as well as our newly added mobile applications for direct downloads into your mobile cell phones.
Our DJs can take you on flights like super star trance dj Armin Van Buuren as well as to the deepest darkest and dirty roots of progressive house and electro like Robbie Rivera, Dirty South, Deadmau5, and Steve Angello & Sebastian Ingrooso.
Also some other producers that get airwave time are: Junior Vasquez, Eric Prydz, Pryda, Terranova, Chus & Ceballos, Jay Lumen, Pryda, Alexandra Prince, Dahlback, Noir, Gadjo, Young Rebels, Francisco Diaz, D.O.N.S, DBN, John Acquaviva, Olivier Giacomotto, Austin Leeds, DJ Fist, Danny Tenaglia, Oxia, Tom Clark, Emjae, Tocadisco, Jerome Isma-ae, Andy Cato, Kascade, Jim Rivers, Studio Apartment, Ron Carroll, Gianluca Motta, QBA, Laidback Luke, Roger Sanchez, Above & Beyond, Andy Moor, Gareth Emery, Junior Jack, Masters at Work, Dennis Ferrer, Jerry Ropero, Little Louie Vega, Wally Lopez, George Morel, Tiger Skin, Steve Lawler, Chris Lake, Paul Van Dyk, Tiger Stripes, Simon & Shaker, Markus Schulz, Tiesto, Paduraru, Jimpster, Studio Apartment, Filterheadz, Seamus Haji, D. Ramirez, Josh Wink, Alex Gold, Adam K, David Guetta, Brandon Walle, DJ Megan, James Peralta, Anthony Bova and as well as many popular record labels such Armada, Ultra, Subliminal, Toolroom, Vendetta, Anjunabeats, Anjunadeep, Sheeva, Stealth, Blackhole, Addictive Global, Intuition, Juicy, Pacha, Baroque, Coldharbour, Drumcode, Euphonic, Iberican, Stereo, Kult, NY Love, Slanted Black, Songbird, Defected, Hollister, Tommy Boy, Ibiza, Pacha, miamibeatz.com, Amnesia, Space, Global Gathering, Big Love and many others....
Please check out our myspace for news updates and dj schedule on our myspace page:
santiagoproductions.podomatic.com
For dj bookings and inquires please email us at: spglobalmusic@rocketmail.com.
Please donate and support SP GLOBAL DJ PODCAST.
Hope to see you on dancefloor soon!!!
(All podcasts are for promo use only. You can find songs on our tracklist and purchase them on either ITunes or Beatport)
channel.itunes:subtitle: Progressive House, Electro, Tribal, Techno, Minimal, Trance, Chillout, Electronica

item.title: DEMON SURFER
item.description: Gerard Mattera Is a New York DJ with a love for Vinyl and Classic Beats with a "No Laptop Required Attitude". His Signature Style embraces Current beats with The Old School Sound to always deliver a new Experience to his audience. The Artwork has been provided by Brett Schmidt at www.demonpack.com Enjoy it! Send me Some Comments.... Don't Forget to subscribe to my Podcast and also join My Face book page http://www.facebook.com/GerardMattera Love and Beatz Gerard This is FOR PROMO ONLY!!! All Bookings Contact: gerardmattera@gmail.com www.facebook.com/DJGERARDMATTERA. ALSO LINK UP TO MY WEBSITE AT www.gerardmattera.com

item.title: Tribal Kingdom 1
item.description: Hey Guys! Welcome to Volume I of the Series Tribal Kingdom. A mix of a lot of Classics Reworked, tons of New Tracks, and A lot of Drums.. The Artwork has been provided by Brett Schmitt at www.demonpack.com Enjoy it! Send me Some Comments.... Don't Forget to subscribe to my Podcast and also join My Face book page LILL GEE'S BEAT MACHINE at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=57492241459&ref=ts Love and Beatz Gerard This is FOR PROMO ONLY!!! All Bookings Contact: gerardmattera@gmail.com www.facebook.com/DJGERARDMATTERA
